main.title: Overview
main.text: SBTCVM's virtual machine is what SBTCVM's utilities and backend revolve around. Naturally, it can seem a bit daunting at first.
main.title: Controls
main.text: ESCAPE = pause menu. press while in pause menu to resume VM. F1 = launch helpviewer F2 = step-by-step debug F4 = toggle status display update F7 = capture screenshots of raster displays F8 = capture screenshot (works in menus as well) F10 = manually dump memory maps to capture directory.
